LookupTable_s Struct Reference

#include <fgrab_struct.h>

Data Fields

unsigned int format
unsigned int id
unsigned int * lut

Field Documentation

unsigned int LookupTable_s::format

reserved for future use

unsigned int LookupTable_s::id

ID (LUT_RED, LUT_GREEN, LUT_BLUE, LUT_GRAY, etc.

unsigned int* LookupTable_s::lut

pointer to field data, maximum 32 Bit

unsigned int LookupTable_s::nrOfElements

Number of field elements in the lut field

unsigned char LookupTable_s::number

the log number of LUT, if more than one LUT of the same id is used
